description:
Connection Makes a Smarter Business

WeCom is a professional office management tool created by Tencent WeChat team for companies. Connected with WeChat messages, mini programs and WeChat Pay, it has a powerful messaging capability aligned with WeChat and comes with a wide variety of free OA apps to help companies achieve efficient working and management experience inside and outside organization. With comprehensive security, international authorized certification and bank-level encryption, it will ensure the data security of your company.
Optimized experience and fixed bugs.
Productivity Tools and Basic Experience
1. Emails
- Activate the WeCom Mail service to work with WeCom in a more stable and secure way. Basic email features are free of charge, and the prices for advanced features have been reduced by 70%. Admins can now activate and inquire about the service for free in the Admin Console on the web and in the client.

2. Smart Sheet
- The editing feature has been enhanced — the right-click menu in the content area now includes icons for more intuitive operations. You can quickly filter, group, and sort by right-clicking on field headers.
- The editing feature has been enhanced, allowing you to quickly filter records by right-clicking on personnel or option content to select “Include This Person”, “Include This Option”, “Exclude This Person”, or “Exclude This Option.”
- In smart sheets, filters now apply only to the individual user by default, ensuring that filtering actions do not affect other users viewing the sheet. However, one can also choose to synchronize filter settings with all.
- You can now pin frequently used filter options to the toolbar to facilitate data filtering.
- The editing feature has been enhanced, enabling you to right-click on field headers or options and use the "Data Visualization" feature to create dashboards or add charts based on the selected content with just one click.
- The collected data can now be associated with smart sheets. Smart sheets can group and display data by "Department" and automatically generate statistical charts in the dashboard for better data visualization.
- In sheets and Gantt views, you can quickly adjust the freeze pane by dragging the freeze line.

3. Chat and Basic Experience
- In the @Me group, you can now set preferences to include or exclude unread messages for all members, making it easier to sort and view unread messages.
- When you create a group chat on PC, existing group chats with selected members will be recommended, reducing the need to create duplicate groups and streamlining the chat list.

4. Approvals
- Approval templates can now be configured with custom print formats, offering greater flexibility in template management.
- Electronic signatures of approvers can now be included in the exported approval documents, ensuring complete information retention.

5. HR
- During payslip imports, formulas within spreadsheet files can be recognized for easy use.

Connect with WeChat
1. Customer Group
- You can now set "Restrict group members from adding each other as contacts" for external groups to prevent customers from being added by other companies, thus avoiding the loss of customer resources. This option can be set for individual groups or configured in batches using group templates.

2. Contact Customers
- The "Contact Customers" feature now includes "Receipt Conversion Analysis", allowing for clear quantification of customer service value. Transactions occurring within 7 days or 1 day after customer service are included, covering online Mini Programs, websites, apps, and offline stores. Detailed receipt information from stores and members can also be viewed.
- For external receipt codes sent by members, admins and business owners can now verify those approved by the company, facilitating fine-grained control of receipt risks.

3. Optimized Basic Experience
- The maximum size for sent and received file messages is increased to 1 GB, with download availability extended to 14 days.
- The time limit for recalling file messages is extended to 3 hours.

Advanced Features
- Superiors can submit unified requests for team members requiring access to advanced features, assisting admins in better managing member needs and facilitating procurement.

Cross-Border Communication and Overseas User Experience
- Overseas colleagues can now view the Chinese names of their Chinese counterparts using Pinyin for easier contact.
- When creating events or scheduling meetings, you can see the local time of colleagues in different time zones for better cross-time zone collaboration.
- When chatting with colleagues in different time zones, you can see if it's late at night for them. This makes cross-border communication more efficient.

Open Capabilities
1. Smart Sheet
- Third-party apps can create smart sheets via API and write data into the smart sheets, which can be viewed and edited by company members. The apps can also add various views via the API, facilitating data analysis and review within the company. Smart sheets created by the apps can be accessed and updated via the API, connecting smart sheets and app data.

2. Third-party
- When the permissions of third-party apps authorized by the company change, service providers can receive event notifications via the API.
source: 腾讯科技(深圳)有限公司
